param.span: 内存的一个区域，它包含要发送的数据。

span.span: A region of memory that contains the data to send.

param.name: socketFlags
param.span: 值的按位组合。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values.

param.name: cancellationToken
param.span: 应取消可用于指示异步操作的取消令牌。

span.span: A cancellation token that can be used to signal the asynchronous operation should be canceled.

summary.span: 将数据发送到连接的套接字。

span.span: Sends data to a connected socket.

returns.span: 一个任务，如果操作成功，则任务完成并向套接字发送字节数。

span.span: A task that completes with number of bytes sent to the socket if the operation was successful.

returns.span: 否则，任务完成时会出现无效的套接字错误。

span.span: Otherwise, the task will complete with an invalid socket error.
